headline.main: HARRIMAN HAILS RUSSIANS' MORALE; Says After Talk With Roosevelt That Stalin Will Fight On Regardless of Losses

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21 -- The government and people of Russia are determined to fight on against Germany at all costs, but the Russian armies "need substantial quantities of munitions and raw materials."
abstract: Harriman conf with Roosevelt; comments on Brit-U S aid to USSR promises; RFC subsidiary advances more funds to Amtorg Trading Corp against strategic materials
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21 -- The government and people of Russia are determined to fight on against Germany at all costs, but the Russian armies "need substantial quantities of munitions and raw materials."...

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
